note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
**PT**: Veja os vídeos disponibilizados gratuitamente pelo site http://globotv.globo.com diretamente na tv pelo media center [XBMC] (http://xbmc.org/).

Inclui vídeos dos canais Globo, GNT, Multishow, Sportv, Globo News, Canal Brasil, entre outros.

Baixe o [.zip](https://github.com/vitorhirota/plugin.video.globotv/archive/plugin.video.globotv-0.4.zip) para o seu computador e use-o para instalação.

Para alterações, verifique o [changelog](https://github.com/vitorhirota/plugin.video.globotv/blob/master/changelog.txt).

--- 

**EN**: Watch Globo TV videos freely available online.

Download the [.zip](https://github.com/vitorhirota/plugin.video.globotv/archive/plugin.video.globotv-0.4.zip) and use it to install the addon.

Check the [changelog](https://github.com/vitorhirota/plugin.video.globotv/blob/master/changelog.txt) to see what's changed.
name: Globo.tv XBMC Plugin
